titleStmt.title: The Whipster of Woodstreet, or, A true account of the barbarous and horrid murther commited on the body of Mary Cox, late servant in Woodstreet, London

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Thackeray ... J. Millet ... and Alex. Milbourn ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Verse set to the tune of "Grim King of the ghosts."
